alert.note: Alert for Northern New Haven (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 6:19PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central New Haven County through 700 PM EDT... At 619 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Prospect, or near Naugatuck, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Waterbury, Meriden, Wallingford, Naugatuck, Wolcott, Durham, Hamden, Cheshire, North Haven, North Branford, Prospect, Beacon Falls and Bethany. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for southern Connecticut.
